restaurants.name: Trio Restaurant
restaurants.address: Near Jaisalmer Fort, Fort Road, Jaisalmer, Rajasthan

reviews.text: Amazing dal baati churma! The authentic Rajasthani flavors were outstanding. Rooftop seating offers beautiful fort views, especially during sunset. Service was prompt and friendly. Highly recommended for traditional cuisine.
reviews.author: Vikas S.

reviews.text: Good food but slightly overpriced for the portion sizes. The fort view is definitely the highlight. Dal baati was tasty but the churma was a bit too sweet for my taste. Overall decent experience.
reviews.author: Priya M.

reviews.text: Best pizza in Jaisalmer! The wood-fired oven makes all the difference. Tried the margherita and mushroom pizza - both were excellent. Great vegetarian options. A bit pricey but worth it.
reviews.author: Rahul K.

reviews.text: Decent Italian food in the middle of Rajasthan! Pizza was good, pasta was okay. Service could be faster during peak hours. Nice ambiance though.
reviews.author: Sarah L.

restaurants.name: Saffron Cafe
restaurants.address: Near Patwon Ki Haveli, Jaisalmer, Rajasthan

reviews.text: Pure vegetarian paradise! Paneer tikka and dal makhani were absolutely delicious. Very affordable prices and generous portions. The staff is super friendly. Perfect for vegetarians!
reviews.author: Amit P.

reviews.text: Good value for money. Food quality is consistent and tastes homemade. WiFi is helpful for digital nomads. Gets crowded during lunch hours. Overall a reliable choice.
reviews.author: Maya T.
